title: Can I get an internship at JP Morgan, Goldman Sachs or Morgan Stanley if I did not attend such a high-end university (Brooklyn College)? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have no doubt about it. Having said that, it may not be as easy if it's not a target school. The answer to your question is best answered by going to LinkedIn and advanced searching for your school and each company to see the results. I'm sure that you will get some results (trust me, I already tried). I would then see which roles are most common and those peoples’ majors in college. You can always reach out and leverage that alumni network. Beyond that, reach out to your career services office and make sure you use all their resources. On a final note, I just remembered speaking to a recruiter many years ago and someone asked if it was too much of a reach. His response: “Do not self-select yourself out by not applying.” Give it a shot. Best of luck!
